item.title: Billie Eilish - party favor
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Am, F, G, E7, Fm
As performed by Billie Eilish
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/v-Nj_ISkiqk
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from https://youtu.be/EWKO4JYYMKU
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Buddy Holly & The Crickets - Oh Boy!
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Oh Boy! - Buddy Holly Written by Sonny West, Bill Tilghman and Norman Petty
Using the chords: A D E7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Madness - It Must Be Love
item.description:
Ukulele play along
It Must Be Love - Madness Written by Labi Siffre
Using the chords: Am A7 Bm C D Dm D7 Em E7 G (Some chords have been simplified for teaching purposes) Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Elton John - Crocodile Rock (Remastered)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Crocodile Rock - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: A7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Ben Platt, Original Broadway Cast of Dear Evan Hansen - Waving Through A Window
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, F(add9), Gsus4, Am, Dm, G, F, E7
From Dear Evan Hansen
See the tutorial video (GCEA) at https://youtu.be/jPyNJ7l_T_A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for GCEA ukulele, available at ukefarm.com. The Motion background video is from pixasbay.com (window-billlowing-curtains-drapes-1000)
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal - Un Poco Loco (From "Coco"/Soundtrack Version)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Un Poco Loco on the ukulele by Anthony Gonzalez and Gael Garcia Bernal. The chords used are G C D7 A D E7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Team2Beat - Que Sera Sera (Whatever Will Be, Will Be)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, E7, D
As performed by Doris Day
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/vX6VZFzac2I

item.title: Gloria Gaynor - I Will Survive (Single Version)
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
I Will Survive - Gloria Gaynor Written by Freddie Perren and Dino Fekaris
Using the chords: Am C Dm E7 F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D DU UDU D DU or D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: War - Why Can't We Be Friends
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. Raised a whole step from the original.
As performed by War.
Rock Cowles of The Spartanburg Ukulele Club posted a song sheet of this song on March 23, 2019, and I thought it would make a great play along. I do use some different chords than the Spartanburg chord sheet. I have created six versions of this play along...full versions for CGEA, DGBE, and Lyrics only (chords above), as well as a modified version that will be better for schools. The full version is blocked in some countries, the modified version is not. A YouTube search should bring up all versions of the song, or you could visit ukestuff.info and access the full listing of songs with clickable links (updated monthly).
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Moving background from downloops.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song posted as a play along.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Hank Williams, Jr. - Ain't Misbehavin'
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Ain’t Misbehavin’ on the ukulele by Hank Williams Jr. The chords used are C F G Am Dm Em Fm A7 C7 D7 E7 G7 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
